Reviews.Title: “Friendly service but five star prices for a dated offer”
Reviews.Author: Stuart53
Reviews.Content: hotel location close accademia reception staff friendly experienced hotel floors 2 person lift unable manage stairs compact homely nice framed posters flooring add local character tiny antiquated bathroom complete foot bath shower sitting tub breakfast surprisingly basic price fruit bowls buffet emptied remained breakfast coffee tasted instant understand popular hotel lagging bit competition

Reviews.Title: “Great location but tired hotel with little to offer”

Reviews.Content: nice quiet location major crowds near accademia bridge water taxi restaurants internet cafe et al bathroom sheets clean recommend hotel due lack service furniture bed coverings tired overall poor attitude proprietor print boarding passes flight weather sunny bit warm floor husband hoping cool air cond response window enjoy air window evening kept due noise hotel restaurant street noise below lots mosquitoes traveled europe times venice past experience disappointing ready leave venice

Reviews.Title: “poor value”
Reviews.Author: Duncan072
Reviews.Content: despite location expensive poor value money double bed space worn breakfast self service little choice tiny quantities scruffy badly cleaned dining recommend hotel
